title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2814.1 - Cash drawdown requests and financial reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2814.1 - Cash drawdown requests and financial reports

State Regulations
(a) Disbursement of contract funds shall be
made quarter-annually upon cash drawdown requests submitted by the company. The
first request shall cover the first three months of the contract term. Subsequent requests and required attachments shall be made six weeks prior to
the beginning of each quarter of the term. (b) Financial reports providing actual
accrued expenses are required for each of the first three quarters, six weeks
after the completion of said quarter. Each report shall be cumulative. The
annual financial report shall be submitted in lieu of the fourth financial
quarterly report. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2814.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
